articles.description: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.
articles.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin

articles.description:
TRX, the native currency of the Tron network, is steady at press time and trending at around all-time highs. After the explosion in Q3 204, the uptrend remains, and buyers are confident that there will be more gains in the coming days. 
 
Tron Settles Nearly $100 Billion In On-Chain Volume 
 
The outlook is partly thanks to growing on-chain activity and shifts in crypto market sentiment after changes to monetary policy in the United States.
 
 
According to IntoTheBlock data, the Tron network settled nearly $100 billion in on-chain volume in the past week. The spike in on-chain volume, the blockchain analytic platform observes, is due to rising on-chain activity.  
 
With the blockchain processing over $98 billion in trading volume in seven days, IntoTheBlock data shows that Tether (USDT) …
articles.title: Tron Processes Nearly $100 Billion In Trading Volume Last Week, TRX Ready For New All-Time High?

articles.author: Jesse Hamilton
articles.description: The colossal campaign spending from the cryptocurrency industry is showing up in dominant fashion in Ohio's U.S. Senate race, where its political action committees have devoted $40 million to support Republican Bernie Moreno's opposition of Sen. Sherrod Brown (D-Ohio), the crypto-skeptical chairman of the Senate Banking Committee.
articles.title: Crypto PACs Dominate Ohio Senate Race, Spending $40M on Sherrod Brown's Foe

articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Shiba Inu ecosystem is gearing up for another significant milestone as the project’s team hints at the potential launch of a new stablecoin, sparking a wave of excitement within the entire SHIB community. Given that stablecoins are essential for providing price stability and improving utility, this announcement has generated a lot of speculation regarding the project’s future steps.
 
Upcoming Stablecoin To Boost Shiba Inu Ecosystem
 
Lucie, a key member and Shiba Inu’s head of marketing, recently posted on the X (Twitter platform) that the team plans to introduce the new stablecoin SHI within the ecosystem. This move is part of the team’s larger plan and long-term roadmap to expand the project and solidify its position in the crypto industry.
 
 
According to the marketing head, though st…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Stablecoin In The Works? Team Member Hints At Potential Launch

articles.author: Jared Kirui
articles.description:
The US government charged two individuals with operating a multi-billion-dollar money laundering scheme. Law enforcement agencies disrupted the global cybercriminal operation and  
seized websites associated with illegal crypto exchange activities.
The US Department of Justice, alongside international  
partners, took down three cryptocurrency exchanges allegedly used to launder  
billions of dollars, particularly for ransomware operators, darknet drug  
traffickers, and other cybercriminals, the DOJ reported.  
Major Ransomware Operations
The two individuals of Russian nationality charged reportedly catered to criminals through their platforms, reportedly facilitating  
payments for stolen credit card data, ransomware profits, and fraud.
One of the individuals is accused of laundering ove…
articles.title: US Charges Two Russian Nationals in Money Laundering Scheme Involving Crypto Exchanges

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Hut 8 Corp. has officially launched its GPU-as-a-service vertical, marking a significant step in the company’s diversification efforts. The deployment includes 1,000 Nvidia H100 graphics processing units (GPUs), hosted in a Chicago-based tier-three data center, for an artificial intelligence (AI) cloud developer. Hut 8 Deploys 1,000 Nvidia GPUs The new GPU cluster, designed and configured […]
articles.title: Hut 8 Launches GPU-as-a-Service Vertical, Deploys 1,000 Nvidia GPUs

articles.author: Cheyenne Ligon, Nikhilesh De
articles.description: The U.S. Department of Justice’s (DOJ) case against Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm will proceed to trial, a New York judge ruled during a telephonic hearing on Thursday.
articles.title: Tornado Cash Dev Roman Storm’s Criminal Case Will Proceed to Trial, NY Judge Orders

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: Analysts from the Kobeissi Letter, a global capital markets commentary, have assessed that the behavior of silver, which is experiencing a larger bull market than gold, may forecast a significant upcoming macroeconomic crisis. According to Kobeissi, silver and gold could anticipate a similar inflation curve to the one observed in the 1970s. Silver Bull Run […]
articles.title: Analysts Link Silver Bull Market to Upcoming Macroeconomic Crisis

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Crypto.com has introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) tool designed to aid developers in integrating natural language capabilities with blockchain functions. The new software development kit (SDK) aims to streamline development within the Web3 ecosystem by enabling easier interactions with Crypto.com’s services and blockchain protocols. AI Meets Blockchain: Crypto.com’s Latest Tool for Developers According to […]
articles.title: Crypto.com Unveils AI-Powered SDK for Blockchain Developers

articles.author: Brian Trunzo
articles.description: Brian Trunzo, Global Head of Business Development at Polygon Labs, argues that DePINs represent an opportunity to build new useful services, while redistributing control and value to end-users.
articles.title: DePIN: Reshaping the Internet and Empowering Users

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Bitdeer Technologies Group has successfully completed prototype testing for its SEAL02 bitcoin mining chip, marking a pivotal advancement in the company’s technological development. The chip exhibited a power efficiency ratio of 13.5 joules per terahash (J/T) when operated in low-voltage mode, a key achievement in Bitdeer’s roadmap. Bitdeer’s SEAL02 Chip Achieves 13.5 J/T Efficiency in […]
articles.title: Bitdeer Completes Testing of SEAL02 Bitcoin Mining Chip

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Crypto analyst Smile has made an ultra-bullish price prediction for Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and XRP, stating they will reach $25, $0.05, and $200, respectively. The analyst also provided a timeline for when these coins will reach these price targets. 
 
When Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, And XRP Will Reach These Price Targets
 
Smile indicated in an X post that Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and XRP will reach these price targets by 2025. Although they didn’t give a specific date or period in 2025, it is believed to be at the peak of this bull run, which analysts like Rekt Capital will be in September or October 2025. This price prediction is undoubtedly eye-catching, considering Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and XRP current prices. 
 
 
So far, the consensus among crypto analysts like Kevin Capital (forme…
articles.title: Dogecoin At $25, Shiba Inu At $0.05, And XRP At $200? Here’s When

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: U.S. spot bitcoin ETFs enjoyed another day of inflows, bringing in $105.84 million, while spot ether funds also added $43.23 million. Blackrock’s IBIT Leads Bitcoin ETFs, While Grayscale’s Mini Ether Trust Gains the Most Ether Inflows Wednesday marked another active trading session for the 12 spot bitcoin ETFs and the nine spot ether ETFs. articles.title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Add $105M as Ether ETFs Pull in $43M on Busy Trading Day

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to experience rapid change, investors are on high alert to identify the next breakout star. Among the contenders in the current bull cycle, ETFSwap (ETFS) is gaining momentum with its distinctive DeFi platform above Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB), regardless of their established status in the crypto market.
 
ETFSwap (ETFS): A New Contender With Lucrative Opportunities In The Bull Cycle  
Built on the ERC 20 standard, ETFSwap (ETFS) offers a unique platform that allows investors to diversify their portfolios through tokenized exchange-traded funds (ETFs). ETFSwap has successfully modified crypto investments by providing 24/7 access to real-world assets through real estate ETFs, commodity ETFs, fixed-income ETFs, inverse ETFs, commodity ETFs, and…
articles.title: ETFSwap (ETFS) Breakout: Can It Outperform Dogecoin (DOGE) And Shiba Inu (SHIB) This Bull Cycle?

articles.author: gautham
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market prepares for its next bull run, Solana (SOL) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are emerging as two of the most promising projects to lead the charge. Market strategists are predicting a 500% rally for both coins, citing their unique strengths and growing popularity among investors. As Solana (SOL) continues to expand its ecosystem, Mpeppe (MPEPE) is gaining traction in the GambleFi space, positioning itself as a major player in the AI-powered gambling market.
 
Mpeppe’s AI Casino Attracts Solana Whales 
As Solana (SOL) continues to grow, market experts are also turning their attention to Mpeppe (MPEPE), a fast-rising star in the AI-powered gambling sector. Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s AI casino platform has captured the attention of both retail investors and Solana (SOL) whales, who are …
articles.title: Market Strategists Say Solana and Mpeppe Will Rally Into The Next Bull Run, Predicted 500% Rally
